author: carlbeek
content:
Hey <@566569593586450445>,

Also open to having it, but not exactly sure why it is needed. I'm mostly just nervous to add too many (rarely used features). The reason it was originally included in this repo is the CLI is a "reference" implementation of EIP2335. AFAIK, sCrypt is pretty much strictly better than PBKDF2. I could see some library not supporting sCrypt tho, so I understand that appeal. I see https://github.com/ethereum/staking-deposit-cli/pull/361 is a thing, was that you and if so why was it closed. I'm happy to get something like this included provided it is hidden behind a flag as <@415109946682769408> mentioned.
